name: Rice Lentil Casserole
ingredients: 1 cup – Rice.  Suggest 1/3 of each brown, black, brown basmati
instructions: Preheat to 350˚F if baking slow or 400˚F if baking fast
Combine all ingredients in a casserole dish
Bake covered for 2.5 hours at 350˚F or for 1hr at 400˚F
Cover with layer of sour cream and then grated cheddar cheese.  Return to oven uncovered to melt cheese topping.
